tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE verified_nodes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    node_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ip_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    public_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    verification_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE node_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    verification_date TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    verification_result BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    verification_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE node_contacts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE node_activity (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_date TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE node_connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    connected_node_id INT NOT NULL,
    connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    connection_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Connected'
);

CREATE TABLE node_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    log_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE node_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    node_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_details TEXT
);
